name: Breath Of The Space
description:
Breath of the Space is a game about oxygen. We lose and find our source of life every second, with breathing. In this game, you will fight against space spiders and try to control your oxygen level. 

Controls 

WASD - Move 

Shift - Dash 

Space bar - Jump 

Mouse 1 - Shoot 

Mouse - Camera

Team

Erdem Duman
